text: Ra yadi hareka ullanghanakarisita dhartika sampurna kuraharu chan bhane ti sabai kura aphu bacnako lagi dina tayara hunecha. Ra jaba tiniharule sajaya dekhdachan ta lajjala'i luka'unechan, ra tiniharuma n'yayapurna rupale phaisala garinecha, ra tiniharumathi kunai prakarako atyacara garinechaina
